name: image-preview
description: Preview images on hover over image URLs

imagePreview.maxWidth.description: Maximum width of the preview image in pixels

imagePreview.maxHeight.description: Maximum height of the preview image in pixels

imagePreview.assetMappingPath.description: Custom path to asset mapping configuration file (relative to workspace root)

imagePreview.assetApiUrl.description: API URL to fetch asset mappings (JSON format). If provided, it will be loaded in addition to local files. Activity ID will be sent in x-activity-id header.

imagePreview.activityIdFile.description: File name in project root that contains the activity ID (default: .activityId). The value will be sent as x-activity-id header in API requests.

imagePreview.apiTimeout.description: Timeout for API requests in milliseconds

imagePreview.autoRefreshInterval.description: Auto-refresh interval for API asset mappings in milliseconds (0 to disable, default: 60000 = 1 minute)

imagePreview.showRefreshNotification.description: Show notification when asset mappings are auto-refreshed

imagePreview.refreshOnHoverThreshold.description: Auto-refresh when hovering over assets if last update was more than N milliseconds ago (default: 300000 = 5 minutes, 0 to disable)
